rules_text: Whenever Redeemed Lycanthrope attacks, if a creature died this turn, transform Redeemed Lycanthrope.
flavor_text:
[i]My home gives me power but more importantly it gives all of us life.
—Vaiko, Risen Lunarch[/i]
rules_text2:
When this creature transforms into Kin Summoner, untap it.
{T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Transform Kin Summoner.
